message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $14,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to your needs, considering its high value to you. I believe this price reflects the quality and benefits of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the opportunity, $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at the moment. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. This price reflects the value I place on it and allows for a fair deal for both of us.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of that, I would like to offer you our premium product for $13,500. This price reflects the value we place on the transaction and aims to provide a reasonable profit for us while still being attractive to you. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
